Interface PasswordUtilsInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
PasswordUtilsController
public interface PasswordUtilsInterface
Interface defining utility methods for password management in the Hospital Management System. Provides methods for password hashing, validation, and handling first-time login scenarios.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Account
    handleFirstTimeLogin(Account account)
    Handles the first-time login process for a user, including password change.
    String
    hashPassword(String password)
    Hashes a plain-text password using a secure algorithm.
    boolean
    isFirstTimeLogin(Account account, String password)
    Checks if the user is logging in for the first time.
    boolean
    isValidNewPassword(String password)
    Validates whether a new password meets security requirements.
    boolean
    isValidPassword(Account account, String password)
    Validates a user's password by comparing it with the hashed version stored in their account.

  • Method Details

    • hashPassword

      String hashPassword(String password)
      Hashes a plain-text password using a secure algorithm.
      Parameters:
      password - The plain-text password to hash.
      Returns:
      The hashed password as a hexadecimal string.

    • isValidNewPassword

      boolean isValidNewPassword(String password)
      Validates whether a new password meets security requirements.
      Parameters:
      password - The new password to validate.
      Returns:
      true if the password is valid; false otherwise.

    • isValidPassword

      boolean isValidPassword(Account account, String password)
      Validates a user's password by comparing it with the hashed version stored in their account.
      Parameters:
      account - The user's account containing the stored password hash.
      password - The plain-text password to validate.
      Returns:
      true if the password matches the stored hash; false otherwise.

    • isFirstTimeLogin

      boolean isFirstTimeLogin(Account account, String password)
      Checks if the user is logging in for the first time.
      Parameters:
      account - The user's account.
      password - The plain-text password entered by the user.
      Returns:
      true if it is the first-time login; false otherwise.

    • handleFirstTimeLogin

      Account handleFirstTimeLogin(Account account)
      Handles the first-time login process for a user, including password change.
      Parameters:
      account - The user's account.
      Returns:
      The updated account with the new password set.
